Package gtu.automation_system_for_cargo_company

Class AutomationSystemForCargoCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • gtu.automation_system_for_cargo_company.AutomationSystemForCargoCompany
  • public class AutomationSystemForCargoCompany
extends java.lang.Object
    The AutomationSystemForCargoCompany program is used to help cargo companies to automate and organize their system. They can create as many of these systems as needed. Each of them will contain users such as administrators, branch employees, transporatation personnel and customers.
    Since:
    2020-02-21

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Administrator
      Administrator is a class the extends the user class and is used to manipulate the system by adding branches, branch employees and transporatation personel
      class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Branch
      Branch stores its Employees that work in that class and Shipments from that branch
      class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Customer
      Customer is see the sender and reciever of a certain shipment by entering its tracking number it also extends from User
      private class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Shipment
      Class shipment is used to store information of shipment
      private static class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Status
      enum status is used to indicate the status of the shipment status can be: -Left the branch-, -Arrived to branch - or -Delivered-
      class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.TransportationPersonnel
      Transportation Personnel is used to mark a certain shipment as delivered
      private class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.User
      User class is used for implementing basic functions of every user such as setting name, getting name, and their types It is private withing this system
      private static class  AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.UserType
      UserType indicated the type of the user.

      boolean addAdministrator​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname)
      Whoever is in control of the system is able to add adminstrators to it System's user interface cannot be reached before the administrator is added since it is the one who is able to control a certain system's users

      • addAdministrator

        public boolean addAdministrator​(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String surname)
        Whoever is in control of the system is able to add adminstrators to it System's user interface cannot be reached before the administrator is added since it is the one who is able to control a certain system's users
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of the administrator to be added
        surname - - Surname of the administrator to be added
        Returns:
        true if the admin is added and false if it is not added( The same administrator cannot be added twice

      • removeAdministrator

        public boolean removeAdministrator​(AutomationSystemForCargoCompany.Administrator admin)
        Whoever in charge of the system can remove an administrator from it*
        Parameters:
        admin - - Administrator is the type as it is a public class
        Returns:
        returns true if administrator is successfully remove and false otherwise
